alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 1:37PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Minor or nuisance flooding from recent heavy rainfall will linger for the next few hours. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Alabama, including the following counties, Colbert and Lauderdale. * WHEN...Until 500 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 134 PM CDT, Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will continue for the next few hours across portions of Central Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Rainfall totals of 2 to 3 inches, with isolated higher amounts nearing 4 inches occurred earlier today. Minor or nuisance flooding from this rainfall will continue through 5 PM this evening. - Additional heavy rainfall may further aggravate flooding concerns later today. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Oakland and Pride Landing.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
